title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that the system authenticates users correctly with valid email and password and returns a JWT token with proper role assignment.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a valid registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify that the login is successful and a JWT token is received.
Verify that the user is redirected to the dashboard with access based on their role.

title: Failed login with invalid credentials
description: Check that the system denies access when incorrect email or password are provided and shows an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an invalid email or incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Verify the login is rejected and an error message is displayed.
Verify no JWT token is issued.

title: Role-based access control
description: Validate that each user role (admin, gerente, supervisor, contador, bodeguero) only sees and can access the permitted modules and UI components.

steps.description: Login as user with role 'admin'.
Verify access to all modules including user management.
Logout and login as user with role 'bodeguero'.
Verify access is limited to inventory modules only.
Repeat for roles 'gerente', 'supervisor', 'contador' verifying their respective allowed modules.

title: Create, update, delete enfunde record
description: Test CRUD operations on banana bagging (Enfundes) including entering week, year, ribbon color, fallen plants and validating data correctness.

steps.description: Navigate to Enfundes management module.
Create new enfunde with valid fields.
Verify record appears in the list with correct data.
Update the enfunde record fields.
Verify the updated values are saved and displayed.
Delete the enfunde record.
Verify the record is removed from the list.

title: Data validation on enfunde and cosecha entries
description: Ensure that the system validates all required fields and logical constraints on enfunde and harvest (cosecha) data entries.

steps.description: Attempt to create enfunde with missing required fields such as week or year.
Verify validation errors prompt user to fill required fields.
Create cosecha record with invalid numeric fields (e.g., negative ratio or waste percentage > 100).
Verify validation prevents saving and appropriate error messages are shown.

title: Inventory stock alert triggers
description: Confirm that the system generates alerts automatically when any supply's current stock drops below the minimum stock threshold.

steps.description: Create or update a supply item with stock_actual just above stock_minimo.
Verify no alert is shown.
Reduce stock_actual below stock_minimo for the same item.
Verify an alert is generated and displayed correctly in the alerts section.

title: Employee payroll calculation accuracy
description: Check payroll roles calculations including salaries, bonuses, deductions and loans are computed correctly according to provided employee data.

steps.description: Create a new employee with salary and assign payment roles.
Add bonuses and deductions.
Register loans with installments.
Generate payroll record for this employee.
Validate the payroll calculations: net pay = salary + bonuses - deductions - loan installments.

title: Report filtering and export functionality
description: Verify that report views filter data correctly by selected time periods and farms and allow exporting data in PDF and Excel formats.

steps.description: Navigate to reports dashboard.
Apply date filters and farm selection filters.
Verify displayed reports update to reflect filter selections.
Export the report to PDF.
Validate the PDF file downloads and contents correspond to filtered data.
Export the report to Excel.
Validate the Excel file downloads and contains filtered data correctly.

title: Predictive analytics configuration and output validation
description: Test the configuration inputs for production/price projections including period and confidence level and verify output accuracy and format.

steps.description: Access the predictive analytics module.
Set a projection period and confidence level.
Request generation of projections and insights.
Verify projections and recommendations respond to inputs and display formatted AI insights.
Confirm projections appear logically consistent with historical data.

title: Farm management CRUD with geolocation validation
description: Ensure that farms can be created, updated, and deleted with correct geolocation data and lot assignments represented on interactive maps.

steps.description: Go to farm management module.
Create a new farm with geolocation coordinates and lot assignments.
Verify farm appears on the interactive map with accurate location and lot boundaries.
Update farm details and lot boundaries.
Verify updates reflect correctly on the map and in farm list.
Delete the farm.
Verify farm is removed from map and list.

title: User management CRUD and role assignment
description: Test that admin users can create, update, and delete system users and assign appropriate roles controlling system access.

steps.description: Login as admin user.
Navigate to user management.
Create a new user and assign role.
Verify new user is listed and role is assigned correctly.
Update existing user roles.
Confirm role updates are saved and effective.
Delete a user.
Verify user is removed and can no longer access the system.

title: API response time and load performance
description: Ensure all API endpoints respond within the required performance threshold (under 500ms) and initial page load is under 3 seconds.

steps.description: Measure the initial load time of login and dashboard pages.
Verify page load is within 3 seconds.
Perform API calls for CRUD operations and dashboard data retrieval.
Confirm all API responses return within 500ms under normal load conditions.

title: UI responsiveness and cross-device compatibility
description: Validate that the user interface is fully responsive and usable on various devices including desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Open the system on desktop browser, tablet, and mobile devices.
Verify layout adapts correctly and no UI element is truncated or misaligned.
Test navigation menus and buttons to ensure usability on all screen sizes.

title: Input sanitization and security for form submissions
description: Verify that all user inputs across the system are sanitized to prevent injection attacks and ensure secure data handling.

steps.description: Submit input forms with potentially malicious scripts or SQL code in text fields.
Verify system sanitizes inputs and prevents code execution or SQL injection.
Verify no data corruption or security breaches occur.
